item.description:
Intermediate II Workshop: How on earth do I get to use the Present Subjunctive?


This 2-hour Intermediate II highly interactive workshop will help you:
  • Review formal commands
  • Talk about current desires, emotions and doubts you have in reference to other people
  • Hide your opinion using impersonal expressions such as "Es importante que ...."
  • Get a detailed list of words that express desires, emotions and doubts so that you have more options
  • And...if time allows...review verbs with irregular subjunctives



Requirements to sign up for this seminar include:
  • currently being able to orally express yourself using irregular verbs in the present tense
  • having been placed at the intermediate level at high school, college and/or a language school
  • not currently being able to talk using the present subjunctive
  • not having working knowledge of the topics to be covered on this seminar



This Intermediate II Workshop will be conducted by Guilianna, Assistant Organizer of this Meetup group and tutor at Spanish Black Belt, leading Spanish language school in Boston.

This workshop is not free. Cost per person for this 2-hour-long workshop is $19 ($9 for the first person signing up).- Only 6 persons are allowed per workshop so please sign up on-line through our secure Meetup page quickly enough to secure a seat. Payment will not be accepted at the door. Refunds can be granted ONLY if requested 5 days prior to the workshop's assigned date.





If you cannot make it to this workshop, or would prefer to attend a more regular class, please click here to access all Small Group sessions currently being offered by Spanish Black Belt.
